text: Tumhi sanga ki, he granthadharakanno! Tumhala kasalahi adhara nahi, joparyanta taurata ani injila ani jedekhila (dharmasastra) tumacya palanakartyatarphe tumacyakade utaravile gele ahe, tyace palana na karala ani tumacyakade je (pavitra kura'ana) tumacya palanakartyatarphe avatarita kele gele ahe, te yancyatalya bahuteka lokancya hatta ani inkarasa vadhavila. Tevha ya inkari lokambaddala tumhi duhkha karu naka
